name: Slime Dungeon (kyle's mit games)
description:
This is the test version of a project that I'm currently working on: Slime Dungeon. At the moment, its most robust feature is the procedural level generation, which generates a new level each time. It also features some complex layering and collisions.

For now, it's still a test version, but you can wonder around, shoot some slimes, collect some coins, and ponder.

Controls: W, A, S, and D to move. Left mouse button to shoot. R to reset level. CTRL to toggle dev view.
